text: فَلَا تَحْسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِفَ وَعْدِهِۦ رُسُلَهُۥٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٍ

translation.en.sahih: So never think that Allah will fail in His promise to His messengers. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution.
translation.id.indonesian: Karena itu janganlah sekali-kali kamu mengira Allah akan menyalahi janji-Nya kepada rasul-raaul-Nya; sesungguhnya Allah Maha Perkasa, lagi mempunyai pembalasan.
